text: He imana vali'o! Tuhade vicom jihara bada apane dina tom phira jave tam alaha jaladi hi ajihe lokam nu cuka lavega, jo alaha de pi'are haunage. Uha imana vali'am de la'i komala honage ate bagi'am de la'i sakhata. Uha alaha de raha vica jihada (dharama de raha vica karara sagharasa) karanage ate kise nu caga akhana vale di jhiraka tom na daranage. Iha alaha di kirapa hai. Uha jisa nu cahuda hai pradana karada hai. Alaha vi'apakata vala ate gi'ana vala hai
